name: Version 0.5.14
body:
## What's Changed
* Add __repr__ to wizlight object by @Teraskull in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/142
* Add coverage for 1.10 firmware by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/144
* Add support for getPower api by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/147

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/compare/v0.5.13...v0.5.14

body:

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/compare/v0.5.12...v0.5.13

name: Version 0.5.12
body:

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/compare/v0.5.11...v0.5.12

name: Version 0.5.7
body:
## What's Changed
* Convert tests to use asyncio (major speed up) by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/122
* Add tests for push updates by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/123
* Add test for discovery by firstBeat message by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/124
* Add test coverage for RGBWW bulbs by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/125
* Implement progressive backoff and improve error reporting by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/126


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/compare/v0.5.6...v0.5.7

name: Version 0.5.6
body:
## What's Changed
* Ensure we can find the 2nd white channel with old firmwares by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/116
* Add remote support by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/119
* Ignore connectivity test push messages by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/120
* Fix reporting available scenes on RGB devices by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/121


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/compare/v0.5.5...v0.5.6

name: Version 0.5.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix KeyError when sceneId is missing by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/114
* Always callback state changes when the PIR is activated by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/115

PIR now supported via callbacl state.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/compare/v0.5.4...v0.5.5

name: Version 0.5.4
body:
## What's Changed
* Tweak RGB Description by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/110
* Add support for discovering new devices via broadcast of their first heartbeat by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/111
* Add RGBW/RGBWW support by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/112
* Add test coverage for getMac by @bdraco in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/113


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/compare/v0.5.3...v0.5.4

body:

name: Version 0.4.14
body:
## What's Changed
* General code quality fixes by @akx in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/92
* Hue Color feature exposed and mapped

## New Contributors
* @akx made contribution in https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/pull/92

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/sbidy/pywizlight/compare/0.4.13...v0.4.14

name: Version 0.4.13
body:
Small fix for TW and DW bulbs (non-rgb).
The scene mapping was not done correctly.

name: Version 0.4.12 - Fix for full RGB Colors
body: No the CW will not interference the RGB full color.

name: Version 0.4.11 - Fix for full color mode
body: Now the colors are correctly defined.

name: Quick Fix for import error
body: Fixing error for importing color-management

name: Version 0.4.9 - Add RGB color correction to lib
body:
The colors now natively defined by the RGB values.
This defines the hue of the color more exactly, and the bulb now shows the correct brightness.

This was moved backwards from the HASS integration in wiz_light.

name: Version 0.4.8
body: Fix some issues and do some caching improvements.

name: Version 0.4.7 - Fix for static kelvin
body:
Now the support for dynamic kelvin ranges for the different bulb types are back.
This was change beginning from bulb FW 1.22 and later. Backward compatibility was added.

name: Version 0.4.6 - Fix for bulb FW >=1.22.0
body:
In the bulb firmware 1.22.x the kelvin ranges are removed.
This breaks the automated detection of the kelvin ranges for TW or RGB bulbs.

This is a workaround with an fallback to 2500 - 6500k.

name: Version 0.4.5
body:
Added auto detection of bulb features.
There is no static bulb library needed anymore. All features will be mapped dynamically an can be looked up via get_Bulbconfig.

You can now initialize the bulb with the "connect_on_init" bool value to trigger a connection test. Only one UDP package will be send!
Default is false.

name: Version 0.4.4 - Timeout correction
body:
Shrink the timeout to 10 Sec and max. 10 datagrams in 5 Secs.
This should be better for a resilient but fast communication - unfortunately we working with UDP - send and forget. So we have to "hope" the datagram will be received by the bulb.

name: Version 0.4.3 - BugFix
body:
After some changes in the lib a (log existing) bug was fixed.
There was a miss match between timout and max_datagrams_send*interval.

The max datagram function properties was removed and will be calculated from timeout/interval to fit in the time window.

Please update to the new version.

name: Version 0.4.2
body:
Added some bulbs and fix small issues.
- ESP03_SHDW1_01
- ESP15_SHRGB1S_01I

name: Version 0.4.1
body:
Some small changes.
 - Support for feature detection of different bulbs added
 - Improve discovery to return wizlight objects
 - Some small fixes and improvements

This will be the last release for 2020!!

name: Version 0.3.8
body:
- Add Timeout Exception for UDP calls.
- Lower the default timeout to 30 seconds.

name: Version 0.3.7
body:
Some small changes and fixes.

- Fixing issue in case of "wake up" and other progressive scenes. Thank you @angadsingh for the pull.
- Add some additional error checks to prevent other mussing parameter errors.

name: Version 0.3.6 - small fix
body:
**Added Features:**
 - Discovery function
 - Exceptions
 - CLI Integration
 - Some smaller bug fixes and improvements

Thanks to @fabaff, @mots  and @bigjohnson for the pulls and contribution 💙 

Bump to 0.3.6 because of a small import bug in the cli part.

name: Version 0.3.5
body:
**Added Features:**

Thanks to @fabaff, @mots  and @bigjohnson for the pulls and contribution 💙

name: Version 0.3.4
body:
- Add auto-discover function
- Add getMac function
- Some small fixes

name: Enhancement from #4
body: Add the enhancement from #4 .

name: Small Fix - Remove exception message
body: Removed exception message from logger to reduce the message size.

name: Fix for missing packet
body: The packet asyncio-dgram was missing in the setup.py

name: New relase 0.3 - fix for some issues
body: Relative import issue and some styling

name: General bug fixes and update
body: fix for dependency bug

name: Async change - no backward compatibility to 0.2.6
body:
Big Thanks to @angadsingh for the pull!

- Fixes https://github.com/sbidy/wiz_light/issues/6: make the whole component truly async using non-blocking UDP
- Light control now works even when lights are set to a rhythm.

Features:
- Now supports switching the light to rhythm mode! (rhythm is defined as a scene for HA)
- Implements a pattern of sending multiple command UDP datagrams until response is received
- Consolidates getPilot and setPilot calls using a PilotBuilder and PilotParser. Removes unnecessary UDP calls for each and every attribute (color, temperature, brightness, scene, etc.) and makes a combined getPilot/setPilot call
- enhanced debug logging for UDP

name: Update
body: Extend timeout and add port config
